code: @Test public void testSetAcceptableSchema() throws Exception {     DefaultPackageScanClassResolver resolver = (DefaultPackageScanClassResolver) context.getPackageScanClassResolver().     assertNotNull(resolver).     // just check the accept schema     assertTrue("We should accept the test:!", resolver.isAcceptableScheme("test://test")).     assertTrue("We should accept the test2:!", resolver.isAcceptableScheme("test2://test")). }
